lead_paragraph: Ireland's High Court upheld Ireland's state-run "bad bank" structure on Monday, throwing out a legal challenge that had threatened to complicate the country's recovery from financial crisis.
snippet: Ireland's High Court upheld Ireland's state-run "bad bank" structure on Monday, throwing out a legal challenge that had threatened to complicate the country's recovery from financial crisis.
